data: The thread Feedback on UI Mockups discusses comments on the latest user interface mockups.
The thread Feedback on UI Mockups communicates that the color palette on page 4 requires higher contrast to meet accessibility standards.
The thread Feedback on UI Mockups states that the product manager will review the palette choices.
The thread Feedback on UI Mockups states that the product manager will engage the branding team for further input.
The thread Feedback on UI Mockups identifies two action items: refinement of the color palette and consultation with the branding team.
